title: How to master on Zed ?
body:
Everybody says Zed is a good champion , i have played as him for many times but i cant master it.
What should i do , how to master ?
Also i cant counter Akali

replies.body: I have played a few zed games but i am no good XD I suggest searching up azoh on youtube and learning his "zed school" Or just watch bjergsen's  zed livestreams. Hope I helped!
